sentence.Network_en: Does coincidence come under the umbrella of the paranormal?
sentence.Network_cn: 巧合属于超自然现象吗？

sentence.Network_en: What an odd coincidence that he should have known your family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他居然认识你的家人，真是太巧了。

sentence.Network_en: It was simply one of those things, pure coincidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是没办法的事，纯属巧合。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... accidental 偶然的 coincidence 巧合 incident 偶然事件.
考博词汇下载（10000词汇完整版） - 豆丁网 ... coincide v． 相符合， 相一致 coincidence n． 巧合， 符合 coke n． 焦炭.
求大专英语B级单词表_百度知道 ... coast n.海岸，海滨(地区) coincidence n.巧合，巧事；一致，符合 columnist n.专栏作家.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... casualty 死伤(人数),灾祸 coincidence 一致,相合,巧合之事 decay 衰微,衰弱,衰败,衰弱.

list.abs: 六级通过必备——六级高频词组汇总_新东方网 ... catch on 理解，受欢迎 coincide with 与……相符 come out 出现，出版，发表，结 …
四字格翻译汇总 ... 当务之急 urgent;imminent 不谋而合 coincide with 莘莘学子 students.
coincidence adder 符合加法器coincidence amplifier 重合放大器coincidence analyser 重合分析仪
accessories 附件accidental coincidence 偶然符合accidental degeneracy 偶然退化
coincidence boundary 重合边界coincidence method 符合法cokability 成焦性

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'occupation of the same space'): from medieval Latin coincidentia, from coincidere 'coincide, agree' (see coincide). Sense 3 dates from the 1930s

entry.def: A coincidence is when two or more similar or related events occur at the same time by chance and without any planning.

example.ex: Mr. Berry said the timing was a coincidence and that his decision was unrelated to Mr. Roman's departure...
example.tran: 贝里先生说这是时间上的巧合，他的决定与罗曼先生的离开没有关系。

means.word_mean: 1. an event that might have been arranged although it was really accidental
2. the quality of occupying the same position or area in space;

sentences.sentence: "he waited for the coincidence of the target and the cross hairs"

means.word_mean: 3. the temporal property of two things happening at the same time;

sentences.sentence: "the interval determining the coincidence gate is adjustable"

auth_sentence.content: This could be coincidence, but I doubt it.
auth_sentence.res_content: This could be coincidence, but I doubt it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This could be coincidence, but I doubt it.

auth_sentence.content: The pairing of Shama and Tate was no coincidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pairing of Shama and Tate was no coincidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pairing of Shama and Tate was no coincidence.

auth_sentence.content: Yet we were still in the infancy of coincidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet we were still in the infancy of coincidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet we were still in the infancy of coincidence.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =fall,表示"落下,降临"; 2. 引申为偶然发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偶然的;意外的;无意中的
stems_affixes.word_buile: accident[n.意外之事,灾害]+al……的→adj.偶然的;意外的;无意中的
de去掉+cid落+uous……的→使[树叶]掉下→落叶的
ac加强+cid落下,降临+ent→意外的掉下

stems_affixes.value_cn: 落下的方式, 影响范围
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进入+cid落下+ence表名词→掉下来的概率→发生事件的范围→影响范围
in进入+cid落下+ent→掉进来的事件
co共同+in进入+cid落下+e→共同落进

sentences.en: She and I both arrived at the same time by pure coincidence.
sentences.cn: 我和她同时到达纯属巧合。

means.word_mean: （意见等的）相同, 符合, 一致

sentences.en: Is there any coincidence between the two opinions?
sentences.cn: 这两种观点有无一致之处?

jushi.english: Is there any coincidence between his opinions and your own?
jushi.chinese: 他的观点与你自己的有无一致之处?

jushi.english: She and I both arrived at the same time by pure coincidence.
jushi.chinese: 她和我同时到达纯属巧合。

jushi.english: By a strange coincidence we happened to be traveling on the same bus.
jushi.chinese: 巧得出奇,我们正好坐同一辆公共汽车。
